pullRequest.title: Integrate new matchmaker ui
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is the implementation of the new tmm ui designed by biass. (It is not finished yet, e.g. a chat is planned, but this is the current iteration.)

At the moment you see yourself in the party view. I left that in because it helped a lot in testing and I don't really know the way to get rid of that. Apart from that it provides the same functionality as the old UI.

nodes.bodyText: With more than 2-4 queues this is gonna go wrong.
Caps breaks with the UI style of the rest of the client
I'd remove the Forged alliance forever, this isn't the only way to play
this is not really ready anymore

+            <HBox alignment="TOP_CENTER">
+                <Label text="STARTING: " styleClass="player-card-text" />

commit.message: Use i18n instead of hardcoded text
Change ready button to play button
Uppercase now controlled by styleclass to enable override by themes
Add new heading for queue area
Implement queue name lookup and shortening
Replace rating labels with league icon + label
Layout changes and playercard grows properly
tmm: parse factions as string, fix status indicators for own faction selection
fix queue join race condition, set queue joined button state based on server state
fix faction parsing for game launch message

nodes.bodyText: U know you can do List just be parsed correctly. If not you need to make some annotation
@FXML would be needed if the properties were private
